title: GeneConstraintScores
description: Schema for storing constraint scores of gene

symbol.title: Symbol
symbol.description: Ensembl gene symbol. Most of them are identical to HGNC

numberExons.title: Number of Exons
numberExons.description: Number of exons in the transcript

cdsStart.title: CDS Start
cdsStart.description: Beginning of the transcript coding sequence if + strand, end if - strand

cdsEnd.title: CDS End
cdsEnd.description: End of the transcript coding sequence if + strand, beginning if - strand

muSyn.title: Probability of Synonymous Mutations
muSyn.description: Probability of a synonymous mutation across the transcript

muMis.title: Probability of Missense Mutations
muMis.description: Probability of a missense mutation across the transcript

muLOF.title: Probability of LOF Mutations
muLOF.description: Probability of a loss-of-function mutation across the transcript

nSyn.title: Number of Rare Synonymous Variants
nSyn.description: Number of rare (MAF < 0.1%) synonymous variants found in ExAC r0.3

nMis.title: Number of Rare Missense Variants
nMis.description: Number of rare (MAF < 0.1%) missense variants found in ExAC r0.3

nLOF.title: Number of Rare LOF Variants
nLOF.description: Number of rare (MAF < 0.1%) loss-of-function variants found in ExAC r0.3

expSyn.title: Adjusted Number of Expected Rare Variants
expSyn.description: Depth adjusted number of expected rare (MAF < 0.1%) synonymous variants

expMis.title: Adjusted Number of Expected Rare Missense Variants
expMis.description: Depth adjusted number of expected rare (MAF < 0.1%) missense variants

expLOF.title: Adjusted Number of Rare LOF Variants
expLOF.description: Depth adjusted number of expected rare (MAF < 0.1%) loss-of-function variants

pLI.title: Probability of LOF
pLI.description: The probability of being loss-of-function intolerant (intolerant of both heterozygous and homozygous lof variants)

pRec.title: Probability of Homozygous LOF
pRec.description: The probability of being intolerant of homozygous, but not heterozygous lof variants

pNull.title: Probability of Hetrozygous And Homozygous LOF
pNull.description: the probability of being tolerant of both heterozygous and homozygous lof variants
